name: Xubinzheng.github.io
body: ### Welcome to Xubin's GitHub Pages. This page will show all of my projects. Including JAVA, SWIFT and Object-C language. But also some stuff on SAS, MATLAB and GAMS. There are photo editor, image adjuster, image puzzle game, external sorting and linked list created by JAVA. And some small ios game created by Swift. Go to my Github and clone anything you need but at the same time please add a commit and let me know if you have any question. #Our IBM IOT design project Please check more information @ xubinzheng.github.io/BlueCrew ###I just found something wrong about SDK IOS starter. Add the Mobile Cloud Services SDK to your iOS app The SDK contains the client code to access all of the mobile services. Both SDKs are subject to the license agreement contained within the archive. Install the SDK and dependencies with CocoaPods. From the folder where you have downloaded your sample, run the following command: ``` $ pod install ``` But I really suggest if someone want to install the SKD, use the following command firstly instead previous one ``` $ pod update ``` Because sometimes due to the previous naive CocoaPods resolver, someone were using a pre-release version of 'IBMBluemix', without explicity asking for a pre-release version, which now leads to a conflict. So use this command to check firstly will be really helpful. ``` https://www.ng.bluemix.net/docs/#starters/mobile/ios/ios.html ``` ###README is a summary and a guide of each project, please read them careful. And some project may need your help to be better. ``` $ cd your_repo_root/repo_name $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ``` ### ImageAdjuster and Puzzle application There are three tools. Run PixelInspector.java : type your link in readFromURL, there already one there for testing. Click anywhere, then print out the RGB of that pixel Run ImageAdjuster.java : same as inspector, tap your link, then you can make chose of what to change on image, including blur, saturation and brightness change. But it’s a little bit slow or sometime need like 10s to finish The most interesting part, Run FramePuzzle : type your link, the photo in there are my CS pro kmp(really good man), then click a block which is next to empty block or the block on the same line of the empty block ``` first the frozen of imageAdjuster second can't change the image in puzzle and the random the small block ``` ### Photo Brush tool open ImageEditor.java, you can enter your photo link in readFromURL(“”). There are three tools. Pixel Inspector: choose and click anywhere on photo, print the RGB of that pixel, then you can use set paintBrush Color tool Print Brush: make your chose, then click or pull anywhere on photo Blur Brush:same as print brush ###KickNinja download the file and touch the screen, it's a small ios game. Please leave your commit. Created by Object-C ### KickElizabeth There a problem I hope you can help me to solve it. I want to add a timer in GameScene.swift. If anyone touches the screen, then gameStarted = true, at the same time NSTimer works. If maskCode == MASK_EDGE|MAK_BALL, game is over, at the same time timer stoped. Then in the GameOverScene.swift, it will push out the time. Really thank you for your time ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
